Class WindowConfigImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ir.taghizadeh.tehran.dependencies.windowConfig.WindowConfigImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WindowConfig

    public class WindowConfigImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements WindowConfig

    RootCoordinatorImpl

    Some basic logic which are related to UI are done here and we can have access to these methods with WindowConfig interface which is injected into BaseConfigsModuleActivity.
